Callitrichidae Cebidae Aotidae Pitheciidae Atelidae
Cercopithecidae Hylobatidae Hominidae }} The 'simians' (infraorder
'Simiiformes', 'Anthropoidea') are the "higher primates" familiar to most
people: the Old World monkeys and apes, including humans, (together being the
catarrhines), and the New World monkeys or platyrrhines.
